question: Bitcoin Up or Down - July 5, 5AM ET
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 Hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: FIFA Club World Cup: Real Madrid vs. Dortmund (To Advance)
description:
This market refers to the FIFA Club World Cup quarterfinals match between Real Madrid and Borussia Dortmund. 

If Real Madrid advances to the next round of the FIFA Club World Cup, this market will resolve to "Real Madrid".
If Borussia Dortmund advances to the next round of the FIFA Club World Cup, this market will resolve to "Dortmund". 
If the match is canceled or postponed beyond July 8, 2025, at 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the FIFA Club World Cup.

question: Wimbledon: Draper vs. Cilic
description:
Jack Draper and Marin Cilic are scheduled to play each other in a Round 2 matchup in the Wimbledon men's singles tournament on July 3, 2025, at 11:00 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “Draper” if Jack Draper advances against Marin Cilic in Round 2 of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Cilic” if Marin Cilic advances against Jack Draper in Round 2 of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 4, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/index.html), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: US-Iran nuclear deal before September?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if an official agreement over Iranian nuclear research and/or nuclear weapon development, defined as a publicly announced mutual agreement, is reached between the United States and Iran between July 3, and August 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Only deals which are officially announced by both parties will qualify. Informal announcements which do not constitute a finalized agreement will not count.

If such an agreement is officially reached before the resolution date, this market will resolve to "Yes", regardless of if/when the agreement goes into effect.

Agreements that include the United States and Iran as parties, even if they also involve other countries (e.g., a multilateral deal like the JCPOA), will qualify for resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be an official announcement by the United States and/or the Islamic Republic of Iran, however an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting confirming an agreement has been reached will also qualify.

Agreements that include the United States and Iran as parties, even if they also involve other countries (e.g., a multilateral deal like the JCPOA), will qualify for resolution.

The primary resolution source for this market will be an official announcement by the United States and/or the Islamic Republic of Iran, however an overwhelming consensus of credible reporting confirming an agreement has been reached will also qualify.

question: Israel strikes Iran before September?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a drone, missile, or air strike on Iranian soil or any official Iranian embassy or consulate by August 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a qualifying "strike" is defined as the use of aerial bombs, drones or missiles (including cruise or ballistic missiles) launched by Israeli military forces that impact Iranian ground territory or any official Iranian embassy or consulate (e.g., if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an Israeli missile, this market will resolve to "Yes").

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Iranian territory or cause damage.

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes directly, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or other operations conducted by Israeli ground operatives will not qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

events.title: Israel strikes Iran before September?
events.description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Israel initiates a drone, missile, or air strike on Iranian soil or any official Iranian embassy or consulate by August 31, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market, a qualifying "strike" is defined as the use of aerial bombs, drones or missiles (including cruise or ballistic missiles) launched by Israeli military forces that impact Iranian ground territory or any official Iranian embassy or consulate (e.g., if a weapons depot on Iranian soil is hit by an Israeli missile, this market will resolve to "Yes").

Missiles or drones which are intercepted and surface-to-air missile strikes will not be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution regardless of whether they land on Iranian territory or cause damage.

Actions such as artillery fire, small arms fire, FPV or ATGM strikes directly, ground incursions, naval shelling, cyberattacks, or other operations conducted by Israeli ground operatives will not qualify.

The resolution source will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will Spain win the UEFA Women's Euro?
description:
This market will resolve according to the national team that wins the 2025 UEFA Women's Euro. 

If at any point it becomes impossible for this team to win the UEFA Women's Euro based on the rules of UEFA (e.g., they are eliminated in the knockout stage), this market will resolve immediately to “No”.

If the 2025 UEFA Women's Euro is permanently canceled or has not been completed by October 13, 2025, 11:59 PM this market will resolve to “Other”.

The primary resolution source will be official information from UEFA, however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Gold Cup Final Winner: USA vs. Mexico
description:

The market will resolve to "Mexico" if Mexico wins the 2025 Concacaf Gold Cup Final.

question: Red Sox vs. Nationals
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for July 4 at 11:05AM ET:
If the Boston Red Sox win, the market will resolve to “Red Sox”.
If the Washington Nationals win, the market will resolve to “Nationals”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Bitcoin Up or Down on July 5?
description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 4 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the 5 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT 4 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 5 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 4 Jul '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the 5 Jul '25 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Wimbledon: Fritz vs. Fokina
description:
Taylor Fritz and Alejandro Davidovich Fokina are scheduled to play each other in a Round 3 matchup in the Wimbledon men's singles tournament on July 4, 2025, at 8:30 AM ET.

This market will resolve to “Fritz” if Taylor Fritz advances against Alejandro Davidovich Fokina in Round 3 of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

This market will resolve to “Fokina” if Alejandro Davidovich Fokina advances against Taylor Fritz in Round 3 of the Wimbledon men's singles tournament.

If the match ends in a tie, is canceled, or delayed beyond July 5, 2025, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/index.html), however, a consensus of credible reporting may also be used.

question: Will Bitcoin Dominance hit 70% before October?
description:
This market will immediately resolve to "Yes" if any TradingView 1 minute candle for BTC.D between July 3, 2025, 15:30 and September 30, 2025, 23:59 in the ET timezone has a final "High" value of 70.00% or higher. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No."

The resolution source for this market is TradingView, specifically the BTC.D "High" percentage currently available at https://www.tradingview.com/chart/?symbol=CRYPTOCAP%3ABTC.D with “1m” and “Candles” selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the percentage according to TradingView BTC.D, not according to other sources or spot markets.

question: Rays vs. Twins
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for July 4 at 4:10PM ET:
If the Tampa Bay Rays win, the market will resolve to “Rays”.
If the Minnesota Twins win, the market will resolve to “Twins”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Xi Jinping out before October?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if China's General Secretary of the Communist Party, Xi Jinping, is removed from power for any length of time between July 3 and September 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

CCP General Secretary Xi Jinping will be considered removed from power if he announces his resignation from his role as General Secretary, or is otherwise dismissed, detained, disqualified, or otherwise loses his position or is prevented from fulfilling his duties as General Secretary within this market's timeframe.

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.
